title: Where next for stock markets? These three charts offer clues
text: My tax-free share portfolio is up 35pc in a year Where next for stock markets? These three charts offer clues Turmoil has gripped financial markets over the past week â€“ is it over? We look at three measures that try to predict where stock markets are heading next Concerns over slowing growth in China blamed rocked global stock markets this week Photo: Reuters
